InformationStage.enInformation:
🌈 Welcome to community whose main goal is cohesion of people learning English; improvement, development and comprehensive support of all skills related to language. 🌈
You can create some meeting to speak or join to existing one. 🙏🏻

CreateMeetingByTemplateStage.enInstruction: Here you can create meeting using template and example :)
CreateMeetingByTemplateStage.example:

SelectWayMeetingCreationStage.enMain:
Please, choose the way to create new meeting!

‚òù🏻Template.
Using template (plain text) to create new meeting.
Just copy existing template and fill it with all required data such as date, location, english level etc...


‚úå🏻Step by step.
Create new meeting by answering questions about meeting details.

SingleMeetingViewStage.meetingNotFound: Meeting with id %d was not found 🥴

AcceptFinalMeetingCreationSBSStage.success: Meeting has been created! 🥳 You can find it in "My Meetings" section. /meeting%d

SingleMeetingViewUnsubscribeStage.main: You've successfully left meeting. ‚òπÔ∏è You can always find and join to it in "View Meeting" section /meeting%s‚ú®

SingleMeetingViewJoinStage.main: You've successfully joined to meeting. 🥳 You can find all your upcoming meetings in "My Meeting" section /meeting%s‚ú®

AcceptTopicMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: Please, enter topic with questions or generate random one by clicking "Random Topic" button

FormatMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: here should be link for meeting format information Hmmm...🤔 What is actually 'Meeting Format'? Let's get this over together! 'Meeting format' means the place, where you get in contact with your speaking partners. ‚Ä¢ For online meetings our community use Skype calls so, please, make sure, that you have this program. ‚Ä¢ Offline meetings take place in 'real life'. It can be some cafe or just bench in the street. So, it's up to you where practice your English!😅 Please, choose meeting format...

OfflineMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: Please, enter you Skype account name...
